org.forgerock.openam.uma.rest

Class UmaResourceSetRegistrationHook

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.uma.rest.UmaResourceSetRegistrationHook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceSetRegistrationHook

    public class UmaResourceSetRegistrationHook
extends Object
implements ResourceSetRegistrationHook
    Hook implementation for creating a ResourceType for each Resource Set registration.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UmaResourceSetRegistrationHook(ResourceTypeService resourceTypeService, ApplicationServiceFactory applicationServiceFactory, UmaPolicyService policyService, SessionCache sessionCache)
      Creates a new UmaResourceSetRegistrationHook instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resourceSetCreated(String realm, ResourceSetDescription resourceSet)
      Creates a ResourceType for the Resource Set and adds it to the Resource Server's policy Application.
      void resourceSetDeleted(String realm, ResourceSetDescription resourceSet)
      Removes the ResourceType from the Resource Server's policy application, deletes all related policies, then deletes the ResourceSet.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
